name: stan
content:
Add to word list

someone who greatly admires a singer or other famous person, to an extent that is unusual: There is a difference between being a stan and being a fan. Beyonce has a powerful stan following.
More examplesFewer examplesSocial media gave rise to the "stan fan".Stans claim a particular singer as their own.Lady Gaga's devoted fans are the most visible example of stan culture.
